mods.abstract: A black and white head-and-shoulders studio portrait of Afrikan Dreamland. Afrikan Dreamland members are Aashid Himons (center), Darrell Rose, and Mustafa Abdul-Aleem. A hand drawn circle encloses the group, and paper cut-outs of the band's name, the Ayo record label logo, and the words "Blu-Reggae" and "Wow" have been glued to the print. An embossed copyright statement at the bottom of the photo credits J. Clark Thomas. On the back of the photo, the following notes are written, "200 20 # gold," and "#3499-25a."

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
